response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we estimate its worth to be $1,000,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $900,000. This is a significant discount, allowing you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We hope you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 900000}
